## PlaneCreationOptions interface

Creation options for plane shapes

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface PlaneCreationOptions extends ShapeCreationOptions 
```
**Extends:** [ShapeCreationOptions](doc/markdown/./scene.shapecreationoptions.md)
